title: Looking for players for 5v5 clash mode (top/mid)
body:
Hi guys

Looking for a few like minded individuals who would be keen to play with us for this clash mode. 

Probably looking for people around gold level (high silver - low plat) so we can be at least roughly the same skill level. 

We have a few positions filled out. We definitely need a top laner and possibly a mid laner. 

Please post your position / rank / age / playing times if you are interested so we can find a suitable teammate. 

Above all we want people who are chill but competitive. We all want to do our best but we’re not pros so we make mistakes - don’t want to get flamed for it. 

Cheers.

replies.body: Jungle/top/sup - G1 Soloq - p5 flex - 22 - varied times
ADC Main, but can Top/Mid if needed. 18y/o, Plat 3 atm
